title: 1021 W 37th Ave
posting_body: ['Text', 'show contact info', 'to setup a showing!', 'Virtual tour: 1021 W 37th Ave', 'AREA: DENVER- Lower Highlands', 'FEATURES:', 'Charming property in fantastic LoHi location!', 'This home features an adorable front porch, private backyard, downstairs storage area, and several upgrades!', 'Great location close to LoHi restaurants and parks, paved trail and Denver trail system.', 'INCLUDED UTILITIES:', 'TENANT PAID UTILITIES:', 'All utilities paid by tenant.', 'BEDROOMS & BATHROOMS: 1 full bath (shower) and 2 bedrooms on main level', 'KITCHEN APPLIANCES INCLUDED:', 'Refrigerator, stove/oven, dishwasher, garbage disposal, microwave', 'LAUNDRY:', 'Stackable washer and dryer included', 'FLOORING: Laminate , Tile', 'HEAT/COOLING: Natural Gas Heating, Central Air', 'PARKING: 2 spots in front of the property', 'FENCING:', 'Full Fenced backyard', 'BASEMENT: No basement but there is a downstairs storage area', 'RESTRICTIONS:', 'Up tp 2 pets considered with a one-time non-refundable pet fee of $250 per pet.', 'Sorry, but we cannot allow any of the following breeds of dog: American Pit Bull Terrier, American Staffordshire Terrier, and Staffordshire Bull Terrier.', 'SECURITY DEPOSIT:', "Security deposit is equal to one month's rent.", 'APPLICATION FEE: $30 per adult.', 'Please note we have a 700 minimum credit score for all properties.', 'AVAILABILITY DATE: August 1, 2022', "**Applicants must be able to start a lease within 1 week of the property's listed availability date.", '**', 'LEASE TERM: Initial lease to end April through June of 2023 with 12-month extensions possible at that time.', 'Growing marijuana inside or outside the premises is not allowed, smoking of any kind inside the property is not allowed.', 'Minimum 700 credit score required.']
